original: Ödlund, Helge Olof, civilingenjör, fd. yrkesinspektör, skyddsinspektör, Linköping, f. 16/5/83 i Njurunda, Väster-norrl. 1., av landsfiskal O. P. Ö. o. Hilma Schöblom. G. 13 m. Anna Holmberg. Barn: Erik f. 14, d. 16, Gunborg Elisabet 17, Kerstin 22. — Tekn. elemisk. i Norrköp. 00-03, kompl. f. stud:ex. 05, avgiex. fr. KTH (M) 08. Ing. v. Sthlm,s stads gasverk ()8-13, yrkesinsp: as sist. i Härnöisand 14-17, i Gbg 1(7-23, förste byråing. i soc:styr. 23-26, yrkesinsp. i tredje distr. i Lin-köp. 26-46. Skyddsinsp. h. Holmens Bruks o. Fabr. A-B f. dess samtl. fabr. fr. 46. Deleg. f. sv. staten v. soc. veckan i Helsingfors 28. Led. av dir. f. centrallas. i Linköp. Studires. m. statsunderst. t. Tyskl. 14, 26, Norge 19. Skr.: Jämför, härdn:- o. glödgn :prov m. anv. av gas, koks o. kol (11), An-läggn. f. bortsugn. av skadl. gaser (18), Arbetsskyddsanordn. in. fiskkonserv-ind. (19), Om mätlängd. f. mätn. av brottförlängn. v. dragprov (25), Yrkesinsp. sträv. o. ind. prod :kostn. (26), Natronlut o. sprickbildn. i ångpanme-plåt (26), Vad är yrkesinsp. — vilken dess uppgift? (29) m. fl. RVO 36.
translated: Ödlund, Helge Olof, Civil Engineer, former occupational inspector, safety inspector, Linköping, b. 16/5/83 in Njurunda, Väster-norrl. 1., son of bailiff O. P. Ö. and Hilma Schöblom. Married 13 with Anna Holmberg. Children: Erik b. 14, d. 16, Gunborg Elisabet b. 17, Kerstin b. 22. — Technical Elementary School in Norrköping 00-03, completed secondary school 05, graduated from KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) (M) 08. Engineer at the Stockholm city gas plant 08-13, occupational inspector in Härnösand 14-17, in Gothenburg 17-23, chief bureau engineer in the Social Welfare Board 23-26, occupational inspector in the third district in Linköping 26-46. Safety inspector at Holmens Bruks and Fabr. A-B for all its factories from 46. Delegate for the Swedish government at the Social Week in Helsinki 28. Member of the board of directors for the Central Lumber Company in Linköping. Study trips with government grants to Germany 14, 26, Norway 19. Writings: Comparative hardening and tempering tests using gas, coke, and coal (11), Installation for the removal of harmful gases (18), Occupational safety arrangements in the fish canning industry (19), Measurement length for measuring the elongation of fractures in tensile tests (25), Occupational inspection efforts and industrial production costs (26), Caustic soda and crack formation in steam boiler plates (26), What is occupational inspection and what is its purpose? (29) and more. Recipient of Royal Order of Vasa (RVO) 36.
